xtc.lang.blink

Class DebuggerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.blink.DebuggerContext

  • public class DebuggerContext
extends Object
    The debugger calling context.

    • Method Detail

      • showWhere

        public void showWhere(Blink dbg)
        Present the current calling context to the user.
        Parameters:
        dbg - The debugger.

      • unWindStack

        public void unWindStack(Blink dbg,
               int nSteps)
        Unwind the current call stack n steps. If this n steps unwinding exceed the bottom of the stack, this unwinding stops at the bottom of the stack..
        Parameters:
        dbg - The debugger.
        nSteps - The number of steps to unwind.

      • windStack

        public void windStack(Blink dbg,
             int nSteps)
        Wind the current call stack n steps. If this n steps exceeds the top of the stack, this winding stops at the top of the stack.
        Parameters:
        dbg - The debugger.
        nSteps - The number of steps to wind.

      • showLocals

        Parameters:

        remapper - The symbol remapper.
        Throws:
